WorkItem.Description: I'm using WCF Data Services version 5.0.2, and I'm explicitly specifying V3 of the OData protocol with the verbose JSON format (Accept: application/json;odata=verbose). At some point, it appears that they changed the V3 OData JSON verbose format to use the same date format as the ATOM format, rather than the old tick-based format. However, when I specify the service metadata in datajs, it attempts to validate and/or parse requests based on the assumption that the data is in the old tick-based format, and so I get 'Invalid Date/Time format' errors.
WorkItem.Summary: Verbose JSON V3 Date format updated - datajs doesn't handle it yet

Comments.Message: Hi, has been resolved in datajs-1.1.0-beta2
